campaign.title: Social Connection Guide
campaign.subject: Connect your social accounts in 5 minutes
campaign.description: How to connect Facebook, Instagram and other social accounts

slides.title: Connect Social Accounts
slides.narration: Let's connect your social accounts. Once connected, you can post to all platforms from one place, track engagement across channels, and never miss a message. Takes about five minutes.

slides.title: What You'll Connect
slides.narration: Here's what you can connect: Facebook Business Page, Instagram Business account, Google Business Profile, and optionally LinkedIn. Each connection gives you more reach and more convenience.

slides.title: Step 1: Facebook

steps: Log in to Facebook if needed

slides.narration: Start with Facebook. Click Connect Facebook. Log in if needed. Select your business page from the list. Grant the requested permissions—we need these to post on your behalf. Confirm, and you're connected.

slides.title: Step 2: Instagram

steps: Ensure Instagram is linked to Facebook page

slides.narration: Instagram connects through Facebook. First make sure your Instagram is linked to your Facebook page in Instagram settings. Then click Connect Instagram, select your business account, and confirm. If you see errors, check that Instagram is set as a business account, not personal.

slides.title: Step 3: Google

steps: Sign in with Google account that manages your business

slides.narration: For Google Business Profile, click Connect Google. Sign in with the Google account that manages your business profile. Select your business location if you have multiple. Grant permissions. Now your Google profile is connected.

slides.title: Verify Connections
slides.narration: After connecting, verify everything shows green checkmarks. Green means connected and working. Yellow means something needs attention—usually a permission that expired. Red means disconnected and needs to be reconnected.

slides.title: Pro Tips

tips: Keep admin access on all accounts

slides.narration: Pro tips for social connections. Plan to reconnect quarterly as some tokens expire. Keep admin access on all your accounts. Enable notifications so you know immediately if something disconnects. Test with a draft post to make sure everything's working.

slides.title: Connect Now
slides.narration: Ready to connect? Start now and have all your accounts linked in five minutes. If you run into issues, check the troubleshooting guide—we cover the most common problems. One connection, all your platforms.
